briefTitle: RJBC-APP and Breast Cancer Treatment Compliance
officialTitle: Mobile Medical Application on Adjuvant Therapy Compliance and Quality of Life in Patients With Early Breast Cancer: a Multicentric, Open-labeled, Randomized Controlled Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Rate of compliance with adjuvant therapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Females aged 18-70
2. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status Score 0-2
3. Breast cancer by pathology
4. Adjuvant therapy by multidisciplinary team
5. Written informed consent form

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Distant metastases at diagnosis
2. Unable to use a smartphone
